Entry.Name: Weak Crypto
Entry.Description: By using weak ciphers, the encrypted data can be easily read by a malicious actor even without knowing the decryption key.

Mitigation.Textual: The only acceptable mitigation is to use more safe and strong encryption algorithms, based on AES.
Mitigation.Suggested Steps:
1. Open an IDE (e.g., Xcode);
2. Search for the type of encryption algorithms of the CommonCrypto library in the code;
3. Replace the encryption algorithms so that they all use AES;
4. For example from 'kCCAlgorithmDES' to 'kCCAlgorithmAES'.
